PrecisApproval to change the final deadline for project approval set out in the CONTRIBUTION AGREEMENTS ON INFRASTRUCTURE between the Government of Canada and each of the Atlantic Provinces (NEW BRUNSWICK, NEWFOUNDLAND, NOVA SCOTIA and PRINCE EDWARD ISLAND), from March 31, 1998 to October 31, 1998.
